properties.title: WSDL generation integrations for Web Service Testing

section.name: WSDL Generation Tools for Web Service Testing
section.p: The following WSDL Generation tools have currently been integrated and are available from the Project right-button menu:

tr.td: Install the latest JBossWS stack release and configure as required. Extract the wstools script from the lib/jdk1.X/jbossws.jar file into some directory and specify that directory in the soapUI Tool Integrations settings

subsection.name: JBossWS wstools
subsection.p: The recently released JBossWS stack includes a utility for generating a WSDL from existing/annotated java-code; wstools. soapUI integrates with wstools allowing you to run the tool and automatically add the generated WSDL to the selected soapUI project. The added interface will have a "Regenerate with JBossWS" menu option allowing you to rerun the tool as needed if the underlying java-code changes or if you want to change some generation option.
